alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 9:13PM CDT until July 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Brown County in north central Nebraska... Central Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 913 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Brewster, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brewster, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Linscott and Hawley Flats. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 245 and 246. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
